Review.Titre: Great with communication and prompt with getting you your money
Review.Contenu: Really good job communicating by email. Gave me a lower offer on one of my devices but I was happy to get it off my hands and got a pretty good offer on the other. Communication was prompt via email and text. I’ve recommended them to others.

At first I was a bit skeptical about doing business with them but after the first transaction I was confident and comfortable to do so. I had many transactions there after and all were a great experience with fast and courteous service. Gadget Gone was a God send for me as they offered a fair price with a speedy payment process and options.Thanks for all your help GG!!Hank

Customer service is great! Casey Rodney has been super helpful with the issues I have had. I wish they had a direct deposit, Zelle or Venmo option other than being charged by pay pal, Amazon, and mail in checks. My first check was lost in the mail and I am still awaiting the second.

Review.Titre: For the most part I had a positive…
Review.Contenu: For the most part I had a positive expereince.  It took more than a week to get paid due to my lack of understanding of PayPal's policies.  Had they been better explained I would have chosen to be paid by some other method.  I did get my money and was satisfied. Everyone I dealt with at GadgetGone was very helpful.

I sent them my iPhone 7 Plus and got about $100 more than anyone else was offering.  I got paid by e-check which worked out great.  They don't seem to be big on communication, it would be nice to get an e-mail detailing the transaction once you agree to it.   It would also be nice to get an e-mail indicating that they received the phone.  Other than the lack of status updates, it was a great transaction.

I shipped my phones per the easy to follow instructions and received an email promptly when they were received. There were a couple of discrepancies from what I entered in the online form, but I was expecting that since I couldn’t unlock one of my devices. They provided a revised quote and confirmed my acceptance before proceeding. They could not resell one of the phones and offered to responsibility recycle it so I said yes. I would recommend this service. Professional, eco conscious and efficient.

Review.Titre: I just wanted people to know that this …
Review.Contenu: I just wanted people to know that this is a true company & they do come thru with what they offer. I sold my old iPhone 5 for $50, about $15 more than other sites. Even though it was slow to process my order (about 2 weeks) customer service thru email was always quick to get back to me.The only bad thing is that PayPal took a fee For depositing the money and had I known they were going to do that I would have asked for the check.

Gadget Gone is excellent with their communication to tell you when your device has been received, and if there are any issues you need to remedy so they can process your turn in. Prices are fair and turnaround is good.  I'd  use use them again.

Review.Titre: best place to sell your device
Review.Contenu: Took about 30 days for paypal to release the funds to me, if I knew I would've opted for a mailed in check. They thought I was a shop & sold something to you guys and that it needed to be shipped even though the device was already delivered.

I had no issues with Gadgetgone when recently selling my iPhone. I was concerned about sending my phone to this company and knowing whether or not I would ever see a check. Not only did I get emails letting me know they received my phone and would be sending a check, I also got the check right away. No hassles. I would certainly use them again. Great communication along the way.

Gadget Gone is usually at or near the top for online offers when looking to sell your phone. The process is smooth and easy.The only issues I have had are that they will always find the smallest of flaws to  knock down their online offer by $20-$25. This has happened on all three occurrences I've used Gadget Gone.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with the service and…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with the service and price I got with Gadget Gone. The only small problem was the time it took to get a response after sending in my phone. Maybe a better time estimate to expect my check.

Review.Titre: Very attentive notifying me with each…
Review.Contenu: Very attentive notifying me with each step. Payment was rec'vd in a reasonable time. Site offered 270.00 at the good condition rating. Their review stated screen had cracks, reduced it to 167.00. Other then a couple smaller than a pinhead size nicks on side of screen there was not a scratch on it. I understand the reduction and accepted it however  thought 103.00 reduction was a bit much. After all, they are used phones. the offered amount should take into account ware and tear. My cell was better than "Fair" Rating.On a good note they do offer a check instead of a card, which I liked.

Takes longer than other companies to review and pay out, they do pay higehr than others though but also charge a fee for using paypal and don't offer a free electronic transfer or deposit method. Communication is good and easy to reach if you have questions and they respond to emails quickly.

Review.Titre: Good folks they do keep in contact with…
Review.Contenu: Good folks they do keep in contact with you which is good nowadays as you just don't know who to trust. Price they paid me for my IPhone 7 was good compared to others I tried. New company trying to keep up with orders took a week to get my check or would have gave them a 5.

IT WORKS GRATE. THEY WILL GIVE PRICE WHAT THEY SAID BASED ON CONDITION. IF YOU DO NOT LIKE PRICE THEN THEY WILL SEND DEVICE BACK. I HAVE GIVEN 4/5 BECAUSE IF NEED MORE PRICE THEN WE HAVE TO GO WITH MAIL CHECK AND IT TOOK 7 DAYS TO GET MY CHECK IN HAND.

Review.Titre: Very kind service and the turnaround…
Review.Contenu: Very kind service and the turnaround was really fast. Only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars was because I did the “print check” option. My credit union didn’t trust the check. I had to show them the website and told them I sold my cell phone. Other than that, great service.

Good service. They dickered a little about my rating of my equipment. But, they still paid me more than anyone else, and they were not completely wrong about my iPhone wear and tear and provided me with evidence of why they felt that way (pictures) and offered to return the phones if I was not happy with the price the offered, which I was... They paid me within a week of my shipping the phones (with shipping) and the day  when we agreed on price.. So, yes they are a real service I was a little concerned because they are not one of the "big" guys. Good deal.

Review.Titre: My overall experience went pretty well
Review.Contenu: My overall experience went pretty well. There was someone I could always touch base with throughout the process. I will say receiving my check has taken longer than expected, but I believe that is out of their control.

Review.Titre: Overall we were pleased with price and service
Review.Contenu: Overall we were pleased with GadgetGone. Sent them four old phones. They made the process very easy. First we provided information about each phone and they gave us a quote. They sent us shipping labels and we sent them the phones. A few days later, maybe a 8-9 days, we got an email that two of the phones had batteries that would not hold more than 25% charge so they lowered the price they would pay and asked if we wanted them to send the phones back. We still felt like it was good deal.Got a check from them a few days later and it cleared. Done deal. I'd recommend anyone with old phones, laptops, etc. just collecting dust to get some money for them.

Customer service was excellent. Constant communication by text was appreciated. My only disappointment was I thought I sent a perfect phone and it was examined and found not to be so perfect. So I received less money than originally quoted

Review.Titre: It’s nice when you sale something and…
Review.Contenu: It’s nice when you sale something and have everything go pretty smooth. I didn’t rate the company a five star because I didn’t get the price I was asking for. I needed the money so I took it. Otherwise great communication and would totally do it again.
Gadget Gone, Is one of the better Cell phone buyer/reseller companies, Better pay outs, Yet slow sending out payment, Took longer than promised but still 4 Solid Stars!! Would use them again though

After getting my initial offer and sending them my phone, I was told the display was damaged and they lowered the offer to about half. This, to me, seemed absurd at best and dishonest at worst. I asked for my phone back and they upped their offer a bit and I felt I had no choice but to accept that offer. I was later contacted regarding my review and the situation was explained more thoroughly which helped. I would say much more could be done on their part to mitigate customer frustration and I hope they can improve their evaluation process. I would use them again knowing now what to look for and expect but I understand how people could be upset without this insight.

I was very happy with the number and age of products that GadgetGone was willing to buy.  The online process to add items as well as the instructions for shipment were very straightforward.  They contacted me very quickly when the products arrived with their assessment and I received payment in a few days after that.  They definitely had a customer service mindset in all of their correspondence with me.  My only negative comment is that one of the items seems to have been damaged in transport and that reduced the offer from the original quote.  I would recommend they send pictures of damage in the future to help customers feel more sure about the damage they find.
Fairly easy process to do. I didn’t get as much as I thought I would but it was only $40. Difference certainly easier than selling to an individual. I would recommend Gadgetgone

Review.Titre: Communication needs to be improved but I would use them again
Review.Contenu: The only issues that i had, (i sold them 5 phones) was the communication. I didn't always receive a response to my emails in a timely manner. Also, you can't talk to anyone, which for me, is a major issue so you just have to hope for an email response, never the same day. Otherwise it went ok. It takes a week or so to receive $$. My PayPal payment took a couple of days, not same day. Also nobody is there to accept deliveries on the weekend; obviously they are a small, mom & pop operation. Believe this, they will find every tiny flaw. They did pay a tiny bit more than the other comparible companies. I would use them again.

While it started out difficult, the customer service reps and managers took time to explain and review the concerns with my device. They were honest and fair and made a compromise that’s was beneficial.  Overall positive experience.

Review.Titre: Great site for selling older iPhone devices
Review.Contenu: Gadget Gone is the only site that would pay any money for older iPhones (4, 4S).  I recommended the site to several of my colleagues, and they were very happy with the results.  I will definitely use your site again in the future.

Review.Titre: Initially told me my iphone had some…
Review.Contenu: Initially told me my iphone had some issues that would reduce the amount originally offered.  After some very gentle push back they reconsidered and paid the full amount.  They coulda gotten 5 stars otherwise
Excellent customer communication: Quick responses.Delayed verification and payment: I think this was due to overwhelmed holiday season demand. Also due to USPS delays (I chose physical check).
Did what they said, easy process.

Review.Titre: I sold my iPhone 10 for a fair price…
Review.Contenu: I sold my iPhone 10 for a fair price after learning it needed a new battery. Gadget Gone was willing to work with the value once seeing the excellent condition. Thanks!
GadgetGone staff were professional and helpful. I was disappointed at the offer they gave me, but after they did their inspection of my MacBook it seemed reasonable.
Initially had a problem receiving payment electronically, but after a couple of attempts to contact people for help, the issue was resolved. Staff was very helpful and friendly.
Excellent service and great prices. The only thing I would improve is the turnaround time from when I sent in my phone to when I got paid.
quick and easy process.  A few surprises that could have been on the site or a disclaimer but nothing major.  They paid out in less than a week.  I would use this company again

Review.Titre: Convenient, easy, and for a fair price.
Review.Contenu: I had attempted to sell an old iphone to EcoATM and it was a headache. One of their machines was not working properly and the cable was snapped, the other would not read and coonfirm that my phone was working. It had been enough of a headache driving out to and tryign to find these machines in the first place. Gadget Gone on the other hand, made everything extremely easy and even supplied me with the envelope and label to simply drop in the phone and send it in. Within a couple of week, I received my money. It was an easy and pleasant experience, especially since I received twice as much as I would have received from Back market which supplied me with the label to ship the phone but not the envelope.I would definitely use Gadget Gone again if I had an old phone I needed to get rid of for some cash.
The offer they made was fantastic, unlike other companies I’ve worked with in the past. I honestly couldn’t be happier with the outcome.

So fast and easy! Sent out my items on Monday and by Friday I had an email with the cost they were going to give- which was ABOVE what I was originally quoted! Excellent customer service! Would certainly use again!
Selling back my old iPhone was an easy process and gadgetgone was helpful throughout the process.
Great Selling experience. Free shipping and fast payment.
Effortless , simple & quick service to return old gadgets

Sold a couple of devices here. Mostly it's about good experience: fair valuation, fast payment. The time it takes to complete a transaction is a bit long though. But given the overall experience, I would recommend this website to anyone who wants to make some money off their electronics lying idle.

Review.Titre: An easy way to sell your phone!
Review.Contenu: The process of mailing in my cell phone using a postage paid envelope that was sent me was very easy, and as I remember, there was about a week's wait to get the estimate, and then a shorter wait to get the gift card.Initially, I had an issue with prizeout as I was unable to redeem the full amount of what gadgetzone  paid me, but gadgetzone took care of that promptly and efficiently by sending the balance of the payment to me via Paypal, so I have no complaints.It was a painless process, and very convenient

Customer service was excellent.  Process was simpe and easy to follow.  When I failed to do a process, I was timely reminded of my next step.  Inspection and payment was prompt upon receipt of my gadget.

Review.Titre: Very easy and painless process to sell…
Review.Contenu: Very easy and painless process to sell back my phone. With a good initial self assessment there shouldn’t be any surprises. The gift card redemption is a little misleading as there are only a few companies that give back a percentage and it’s not the ones they list. It would be great to know the percentage value “bonus” before deciding between cash back or gift card redemption. Plus the redemption only allows fixed amounts of $5 or more. You might have some unredeemable funds left over if you are  under the $5 minimum

Gadget Gone communicated with me every step of the way! I did not get as much as quoted because of scratches that I could not see, they were very thorough and give you the opportunity to decline the offer. I was very satisfied with the outcome and will definitely use them again!

Review.Titre: Super easy and paid me more than Apple…
Review.Contenu: Super easy and paid me more than Apple of another buyer I checked with to sell my IPad Mini. Highly recommend

Review.Titre: Gadget Gone was really great to work…
Review.Contenu: Gadget Gone was really great to work with, especially after my horrible experience with Gazelle.  They were prompt, responsive and with outstanding customer service.  I would definitely use them again.

Review.Titre: I tried selling my watch on other marketplaces…
Review.Contenu: I tried selling my watch on other marketplace sites and it was a nightmare. Lots of spam emails and fake accounts offering to buy my watch. Gadget Gone made selling and shipping the device simple, fast, and easy.
Gadget Gone was very friendly and easy to work with. I appreciated their quick responses to my questions and would definitely sell to them again.

Good communication and process was simple. I tried selling the same device with a major competitor and they didn’t honor their quote. That company claimed it wasn’t in the condition I stated and came back with a significantly lower offer. Gadget Gone honored their quote. Only criticism is that the cash vs. gift card amount is a little misleading. The higher gift card amount isn’t guaranteed. It’s only higher with certain vendors. Overall, I’d recommend Gadget Gone and wouldn’t waste your time trying the other company that starts with a “G”.

Review.Titre: Highly recommend Gadget Gone, high quote and fast payment
Review.Contenu: I've used numerous buyer and Gadget Gone is my go to company going forward.  Their quoted price are usually the highest, great communication and payment turnaround are fast.  BTW, I tried out the gift card option and I got paid an extra 10%. Easy to redeem with various popular retailers and restaurants.

Process is simple and easy and as promised. A delay from receiving phone to actually getting paid, but all said it would be slower turn around when new phones come out (iPhone 15). Would use again and recommend to friends.

GadgetGone is truly in a league of their own.  I have been selling with them for over 8 years and every single transaction has been flawless since day one.  Their customer service is top notch.  They are quick to review devices, respond to questions, and send payment.  They are honest in everything they do.  There have even been a few occasions where they offered me MORE than I was quoted because the device was in better condition than I thought.  That’s the kind of integrity I look for in a business relationship.  I am customer for life!

Review.Titre: They have been so awesome and easy to…
Review.Contenu: They have been so awesome and easy to work with, any issues or concerns I have they address them promptly and with sincerity.

Very pleased. They paid me exactly what they agreed to pay when I accurately described the condition of my phone. As long as you describe your phone in the correct condition, they will pay you what it’s actually worth on trade.  They paid me $150 more than what Apple offered.
Very positive experience working with Gadgetgone over the last few years. Hassle free selling of my devices, good assessment on the condition of the devices, good prices offered for the devices.
Nice professional company , did everything as advertised. Will use them again in future .

Review.Titre: This is my second time using gadget…
Review.Contenu: This is my second time using gadget gone. They are professional and honest and get you taken care of in a timely fashion. They have an awesome Customer Service team who indeed looks out for you and takes pride and making sure that you feel comfortable with your transaction. I highly recommend them.

I sold my phone and got exactly what I was quoted.  It took a bit longer than I originally expected, but received my Visa electronically in about three weeks from when I sent my phone in.  I was getting tired of selling on Facebook Marketplace because of the hassle, so I thought I’d try this.  People don’t like buying electronics (it seems) so this was an easy solution.

I would like to commend GadgetGone on the speed and service they have given to me and my company with our large bulk orders of sending them old I-phones and the quick turn around with them looking over the phone and sending us our offer.  Will definitly refer them to other collegues of mine for their business.

I was extremely pleased with my first-time experience with GadgetGone.  It was easy to determine the value of my used iPad on their website and follow the directions for sending it in.  There was a delay in my getting the package out the door and I was pleasantly surprised to receive a text alerting me that the company had not yet received the item.  Communication via email and text was flawless.  The value of the iPad was lowered a bit upon the company’s close inspection and testing, which is understandable.  At that point I was offered the option of whether or not to proceed with the transaction.  A couple of days after I provided my consent, the money was in my PayPal account.

The experience is generally very good. They are honest and the process is pretty much streamlined. The only problem I found is that it will take them 7 business days to test after they receive your unit. I think 2 to 3 days is a more reasonable time span. So expect at least 2 weeks to receive your payment after you drop off your unit to USPS.

Review.Titre: Recently used Gadget Gone for the first…
Review.Contenu: Recently used Gadget Gone for the first time, usually I use the bigger box trade ins or sell outright online. Wanted to give GG a try since their offer was more than fair, and the process was simple to use. They may take a little extra time, but it was worth it, as they delivered on their promised offer. I received my money within one business day after the appraisal completed.

Great experience. I had research companies through cnet.com. They had several recommendations to use this site. I found the turn around times, level of communication, responsiveness and accuracy of the estimated quote to be spot on. I’ll be selling other devices to this company in the future.

Selling to Gadgetgone is as easy as 1,2,3. Easy to use website, highest cash offers, and free ship labels. They communicate through the process or you can the status online. Receiving payment is simple. Have sold several phones to Gadgetgone and will continue to do so.

This is my review I posted on Better Business Bureau and thought it would be helpful here as well.Quality Service. Quick and efficient.  I mailed my phone and ten business days later I was paid the quoted amount and then some.  That's right, I received more that what I was quoted because after Gadget Gone's evaluation of my iPhone they determined it was in better condition that I had stated.  I've used other services online and I've never had that happen.  I reached out to customer service twice and received a prompt response addressing my questions.  I give Gadget Gone my highest possible recommendation.

Review.Titre: Sold my iPhone 12. I was paid amount I was promised.
Review.Contenu: I sold my iPhone 12 to GadgetGone and the process worked as expected. They agreed that my device was in "Flawless" condition and paid the amount they promised. I got email updates when they received my device, when it was evaluated, and when the payment was ready. They acknowledged receipt of my device 5 business days after dropping it off at the post office and I received payment 4 business days after that. This was within the timeframe listed on their support page.

Review.Titre: The first offer that was offered was…
Review.Contenu: The first offer that was offered was quite displeasing, however, they are negotiable and we came to a fair price and the payment was delivered and in my account within a few hours. Will be using again when in need for some extra cash!

The communication was excellent. They made me a very solid offer, and I was very true about the condition. After reviewing the condition, they stated it was better than described and gave me nearly $20 more - who does that, they are just an honest company, treating people right!! Thank you!

Review.Titre: They care about your customer experience
Review.Contenu: While not a perfect experience, they paid me what they offered and it was a positive experience for me. Thank you.

Your team was very good with communicating clearly and answered every question and concern VERY fast!Friendly and helpful. I highly recommend using their services based on customer service alone. Offer fair price for phone.

I use Gadget Gone all the time to sell my electronic devices.  I have found that they have the highest online purchase prices, and they have always been very fair in their evaluations of the devices I send their way.  Payment is always fast and accurate!

The process was very smooth. I sent in the information about my phone, received instructions as to how to unlock it, did that and sent it in with the postage process that was sent to me. Once the phone was received, it was not unlocked, but they worked with me and got it unlocked. I received my money within 2 days. I would definitely recommend Gadget Gone to everyone.

Kiara went beyond expectations and delivered great customer service. I’m new to the site so her assistance was greatly appreciated and kept track of my order. Will use this site as its legit! I highly recommend. Thank you so much!

Outstanding company! My experience has been nothing short of exceptional. The entire process was remarkably seamless and effortless. Upon receiving my phone, they promptly assessed its value and issued payment without delay. What truly impressed me was their proactive approach—they actually enhanced the appraised value of the phone in their system. Instead of sticking to the original quote, they matched their current offering, resulting in a higher payout for me. Without a doubt, I will be exclusively working with them going forward.

Great job helping me. I had accidentally sent my phones over attached to my icloud. They were very patient in helping handle the matter and I even ended up getting more money than I had initially expected!

Sent in an iPhone 12 Pro. Took a week to evaluate and get my refund. Easy process, good communication. They even increased the reimbursement because my phone was evaluated to be in a better condition than I declared!
I am very pleased with their professionalism and how they kept their word in handling the sale on my item. I highly recommend them because they are honest and a very reliable company.
Worked as expected no issues and got my payment pretty quick at the full estimated value. 10/10 would use again

Review.Titre: Great response times and quick payouts
Review.Contenu: I received quick responses back from team and paid in full, plus extra for having a better device than original self evaluated. I will come back and refer this company to friends and family.

Review.Titre: Awesome place to sell old phones!
Review.Contenu: Customer service here is phenomenal! And I even got more out of my phone than what I was offered! Hands down the best place to resell your phone!! This is my second time going through gadget gone to sell my, basically, brand new old phone. Awesome company!!

Review.Titre: They performed exactly as they said…
Review.Contenu: They performed exactly as they said they would in their promotional material.  In this "over sell under perform" world, that alone deserves 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Very Pleased, Five Stars, Will Use Again, Will Refer Others to GG!!
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with my iPhone refund and the overall ease of the process with GadgetGone. Very easy process, took just over a week for my deposit, which was expected. I had checked into the phone ATM machine at the market and the cash would have been instant, BUT it was more than half of what Gadget Gone offered me for my phone. GadgetGone was TOTALLY WORTH IT. I will use them in the future and refer others to use it!. Thank you GG!!

Is a great service!  Allows me to recycle responsibly my old phones even the ones that are so old they don't want to buy them back. Customer service was very attentive and I felt like I was getting personalized service.

Outstanding company! My experience has been nothing short of exceptional. The entire process was remarkably seamless and effortless. After receiving my phone, they promptly assessed its value and issued payment without delay. What truly impressed me was their proactive approach - they actually enhanced the appraised value of the phone in their system. Instead of sticking to the original quote, they matched their current offering, resulting in a higher payout for me. I will be exclusively working with them going forward.

Excellent customer service and communication!  They kept me informed throughout the transaction and were very thorough but quick in their process! I was very happy with the offer they made for my phone.

Review.Titre: If you need to sell your phone, this place is legit!
Review.Contenu: Gadget Gone bought my old and broken phone for a fair and reasonable price. It was a simple, easy process, and they were responsive to my questions. I also got my gift card super fast. It was a great experience and I would definitely do it again. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Great company with great customer service
Review.Contenu: Man, great company! They honestly pay really well and while it does take about 5 days to hear from them after it’s been delivered I totally understand it. I’ve sold 3 things with them and have been blown away by them. My personal favorite thing about them is the negotiation I’m able to have. They said my iPad Pro 4th generation was work 396 (not too bad wish it could be higher but they have the best price so it’s okay) and I asked to bump it up a few bucks and they were more then happy to do so! Honestly will keep using! Also payment is super fast!

Review.Titre: Fast Payment, Easy to Sell, Accurate and Fair Phone Evaluation
Review.Contenu: It was easy to get a quote and sell my phone. Payment was prompt. I received the full quoted amount for my phone (based on the description I provided before mailing the phone to Gadget Gone). The whole process, from the time of the quote until I received payment was less than 2 weeks. Plus, Gadget Gone offered more money for my phone than it's competitors.

Review.Titre: GadgetGone is the way to go!
Review.Contenu: GadgetGone was true to their word on the value of my iPhone 13, and sent very sweet emails to check in and keep me updated, to ask if I had any questions during the process, and to make sure I had received the mailing label with instructions for sending the phone.Once the phone was sent, they checked in periodically to tell me they had received it, were inspecting it, had evaluated it, and that they agreed with my description of its condition. Then, I was given the name of who would be paying (Tremendous) and how that would work… plus how long it would take for the funds to appear in my bank account. (One does have the option to receive a Visa debit card, I think, instead)  Everything went just as described with not one hitch. I am so pleased with my experience that I have told others to be sure to use GadgetGone before considering any other option if they need to get rid of their old cell phone(s). (I was surprised to see they also accept laptops and old tablets too!)

Gadget Gone was very quick to notify me that they received my phone. Also the evaluation of the phone was exactly what I felt was fair. Payment was in.my account within a couple days. Will do business with them in the future.

It’s such a joy working with these people. I’ve been doing business with them almost from when they began & every single transaction has been better than the last.  I’ve never had to wait for an answer to a question.  Never had to question any answer I’d been given.  Everything was done on time or even earlier than promised, and I’ve always been more than happy with the offers I’ve been given.  I just can’t say enough good things about the caring & capable people in this company.  Here’s to many, many, many more years of business.

Review.Titre: My experience was so good because I was…
Review.Contenu: My experience was so good because I was so excited to these
Kiara provided excellent customer service by email through selling my old cell phone. Kiara went above and beyond to assure the process went smoothly and I was satisfied.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: I read lots of reviews before deciding on these guys and I'm glad I chose them!
Review.Contenu: I read lots of reviews before choosing this particular company to sell my phone to. A lot of the various reviews seemed to come back to the idea that other companies might pay more or offer a larger initial quote to get your business but then they often find ways to whittle the quote way down until you've gotten a fraction of what was expected. After lots of research these guys felt the most reputable and trustworthy. The entire process from start to finish was simple and painless and after they reviewed my phone they came back offering more than I expected for the phone!  I definitely will always do business only with this company from now on, as they definitely lived up to the reviews and research I had performed and the experience was very positive the entire way.
Kept me informed of what was happening once they received my item.  Sent me a photo to explain their assessment.  Prompt payment.

At first, I was worried when I read some reviews after I shipped my product, but then my payment came through on PayPal. It took a few days because of the volume they have but they did send my payment worth every minute. This is a trustworthy site just as long as your PayPal and everything is working you will not have a problem. I am extremely happy I did this.
I always receive prompt, professional, and courteous service. I have used this company numerous times when I upgraded devices.  Service is quick and offers are always fair.
Communication was great and overall experience was very good.  Got more money than originally quoted!  Would use again.  Thank you!!

Review.Titre: Although the process takes 2 weeks to…
Review.Contenu: Although the process takes 2 weeks to complete, they’re 100% a real company and provide you with the best price for you device between their competitors. I would even recommend them over eBay!

Review.Titre: They made it easy to submit my device…
Review.Contenu: They made it easy to submit my device by providing a prepaid shipping label. Communication was great. I actually got paid more than the original quote.
Communication was very clear and transparent! Appreciated the follow up support when an issue came up.

Review.Titre: It was super easy to sell my phone the…
Review.Contenu: It was super easy to sell my phone the customer service team were great it was a fast pay out. It was a quote for my phone and they told me that it was in better condition than I described so they upped the price and I got more money than expected. Thank you gadgetgone team.    June
Perfect. They paid what they offered, paid promptly and had a great customer service. Highly recommended.
Great experience selling iPhone. No issues. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Third time I’ve used gadgetgone and a…
Review.Contenu: Third time I’ve used gadgetgone and a great experience a s always

Review.Titre: such a great place to sell your used…
Review.Contenu: such a great place to sell your used phone. recommend to anyone! they are communicative throughout the entire process.

Process was very simple to do.  Phone value actually increased between the time I got my quote and the time they examined the phone.  They were kind enough to give me the higher price.  I was paid immediately after they examined my phone.  I would definitely use them again.
Excellent, friendly communication - and they told me I had underrated the condition of two of our devices, so we got even more money than they initially quoted! Great experience.

Review.Titre: I got the amount that they said
Review.Contenu: I got the amount that they said they would give me.  I had a flawless iPhone and they gave me the quoted price for a flawless iPhone. Be patient as it appears they are getting a lot of items to review.  In my particular case, it took about 7 business days.  Once they accepted my phone, it took about 2 days to get paid.  I would use them again!

Review.Titre: Initially I was not sure about the…
Review.Contenu: Initially I was not sure about the company.   Read the reviews and took a chance and I was very happy with Kiara email as it was fair amount.  I will definitely be in touch with your company for future trade in and will also refer to family and friends.   Thanks once again and keep up with the good business.

They are the real deal. I was hesitant at first but took a chance. The process was super easy. They made me a great offer where everyone else low balled me.They do have a slight wait period however stood true to their policy. Highly recommend.
Seamless processing. Very prompt and friendly customer service - Kiara was exceptionally awesome. I am in the process of selling my second phone with them.
Excellent experience.Any issues or concerns that i have i was able to email them and they were addressed quickly.

Review.Titre: Gadget Gone was easy to use
Review.Contenu: Gadget Gone was easy to use and prompt with the payout. I was skeptical, but the service ended up great. The only thing I would say is that the gift card is not the best option.
Great turnaround and nice communication along the whole process. Would def go this route again!
Gadget Gone made sale of my used iPhone so simple, status updates were frequent, payment was prompt.
The gadgetgone team was great. They gave me more than what was quoted communication was great and the payout was fast. Thank you gadgetgone team.
Price was a little lower due to deep scratches, but the decrease was fair.  Smooth an easy process.

Review.Titre: Excellent Payout. Takes time for evaluation
Review.Contenu: Excellent. I got paid more than how much I was quoted. Only thing I do not like is that they take 8-10 days for order evaluation after delivery. I hope they are like that in the future too. Most highest payout for phones.
My experience was great, they made a great offer for me in a timely manner without any issues. Would recommend to anyone
This was my first time using this company. I was very impressed with their process and customer service to answer my questions. I would use them again in the future!
Very helpful and responsive customer service. Free shipping and excellent pay out. Will use them again.

Review.Titre: Best selling experience and Best Price
Review.Contenu: Best selling experience for the second time for me. Always the best evaluation and best price in the market. Love you GadgetGone.

Review.Titre: The process was extremely quick and…
Review.Contenu: The process was extremely quick and easy. I’ve sold to gadget gone multiple times and have never had a single issue. Absolutely worth it.

Review.Titre: Always a good selection of phones
Review.Contenu: Always a good selection of phones,  I have bought 4 from them and never had a problem with any of them

Review.Titre: They sent me the exact estimate…
Review.Contenu: They sent me the exact estimate payment  of my flawless-condition Thinkpad. I will continue to use them.
The experience was great start to finish. They made it easy, kept me informed every step of the way, and gave me a fair price for my iPhone. I highly recommend Gadget Gone.

Review.Titre: Fast transaction and got exactly what I…
Review.Contenu: Fast transaction and got exactly what I was expecting! Will definitely use in future again to sell my phones!
My experience was easy, they were easily accessible for any questions and my payment ended up being more than the quoted price once they received it!

Review.Titre: Received more than initial quote due to…
Review.Contenu: Received more than initial quote due to condition of the device. Very fast service and response time.
I got my quote immediately and shipped it the same day. They got back to me as soon as it was delivered and the same day they evaluated it was the same day I got my payment!
They did a lovey job of explaining me to process step by step and always remained friendly and kind. Thank you :)

Review.Titre: It was really easy to use
Review.Contenu: It was really easy to use. Free to ship, all you have to do is print out a label. Got my money “I requested a gift card to get a little more) I was able to add it to my Amazon account. They didn’t dispute the condition of my phone.
